about_the_game: This demo shows the fundamental gameplay mechanics of Stick Nightmare. There are 3 stages plus the presentation for the first Boss. The final game includes cutscenes, more than 30 stages and 4 bosses.
detailed_description: This demo shows the fundamental gameplay mechanics of Stick Nightmare. There are 3 stages plus the presentation for the first Boss. The final game includes cutscenes, more than 30 stages and 4 bosses.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 Sandy Bridge or equivalent, 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video with opengles 2.1 support
  • Storage: 141 MB available space

name: Stick Nightmare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: Core i3 Sandy Bridge or equivalent, 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video with opengles 2.1 support
  • Storage: 141 MB available space

short_description: Have a look at 3 stages of Stick Nightmare!
